channel.title: Posts on Null Comment
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Null Comment

item.title: The Shining Sea
item.description: Extremely well written but weak story. 6/10

item.title: Wait for Me Yesterday in Spring
item.description: Cool narrative structure going backwards. Some scenes were weird though. 7/10

item.title: I Will Forget This Feeling Someday
item.description: The story isn’t great, but the method it’s told is fascinating and the dialogue carries some heavy feels. 8/10
There’s so much I didn’t like but I can’t stop thinking about it. 8/10

item.title: Suzume
item.description: It’s not another Your Name or Weathering with You. rururururu~ 9/10

item.title: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
item.description: Cute funny parts were good. Serious drama parts were bad. 6/10

item.title: Projects in Progress
item.description: A list of things I’m thinking about. This will be updated periodically, whenever I feel like it.
